rules_text:
Whenever Ihosk’s Beastmaster enters the battlefield, you get an amount of {E} [i](energy counters)[/i] equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
{T}, Pay {E}{E}: Until end of turn, target land you control becomes a 5/5 green Crab creature with haste. It’s still a land. Activate only as a sorcery.
